**Functional Purpose**: Label for the 'All Sizes' option in the task size filter, both as a selectable option and as the reset button's title.
**UI Location**: Task list filter → Size switcher dropdown, and Reset button title
**When Users See This**: When no specific size is selected (default), or when the user wants to clear size filters.
**Technical Context**: Used in two places: as the selected value when nothing is explicitly chosen, and as the title for the reset component.
**Current English**: "All" (for selected state); "All sizes" (for reset button title)
